ISSUE.TITLE: Upgrade to Django 5.2
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Upgrade from Django 5.1 to Django 5.2 for NetBox v4.3. ### Justification Django 5.2 is [expected to release](https://code.djangoproject.com/wiki/Version5.2Roadmap) in early April, which coincides with the NetBox v4.3 beta period.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18627: Proxy routing (#18681) * Introduce proxy routing * Misc cleanup * Document PROXY_ROUTERS parameter

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18822 from netbox-community/18743-django-52 Closes #18743: Upgrade to Django 5.2
